title: Smart Pings
body: So one thing that pisses me off a lot is how some people use smart pings. More specifically telling you to be careful while you are in a fight that you have to commit to. The ping is annoying and throws me off my game and i was wondering if there is a way to mute pings since muting a player still shows their pings. Thank you!

replies.body: Too many pings can certainly be an earful, and there is an option to help with that!  While it's not currently possible to mute a single player's mute, you can reduce ping volume.  The option is available in-game under Sound Options, and an option for ping sound.  There is also a limit to how many times a player can ping in a duration, so it doesn't spam.  Hope that helps!

What's the reason why you don't let us mute a single player's pings? 
If that player is repetitively spamming (question mark) pings, it is extremely annoying for one, while it distracts not even you but also the <insert bad name, i.e. idiot> who is spamming them.

I do want to hear the pings of my other team members clearly, so reducing the total ping volume is not a good solution (it diminishes proper communication way too much).

At least let me lower their ping limit to 4, something more bearable and realistic.
